title: Death by Nostalgia
description: When a young woman is shot dead in the ruins of the demolished building she used to call home, it's up to kleptomaniac detective Felix Green and his straight-laced associate, Sam Alders, to solve the case before the department runs out of patience with both of them. The investigation will take them into a world of memories, full of old grudges, lost loves, and missing gold as they unravel the most unusual case of Death by Nostalgia.
author: Andrew Stanek
